message.content:
cs.GT, cs.IR, cs.LG, cs.DS, cs.AI. 

The paper deals with designing a truthful mechanism for a multi-round auction setting in pay-per-click advertising, which involves game theory (cs.GT), information retrieval (cs.IR), and machine learning (cs.LG). The problem can also be viewed as a strategic version of the multi-armed bandit problem, which falls under the category of algorithms and data structures (cs.DS) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI).
